# 颜色（Color）

# 栅格系统（Flex）

# 默认

不指定 b-col-* 时将均分，就是普通的 flex: 1; 属性

<div class="b-row">
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
</div>

# 12 格

默认为 12 格栅格系统

<div class="b-row">
    <div class="b-col-1 item">1/12</div>
    <div class="b-col-2 item">2/12</div>
    <div class="b-col-4 item">4/12</div>
    <div class="b-col-5 item">5/12</div>
</div>

# 10 格

为了适应更多情况，添加了 10 格栅格

<div class="b-row b-row-10">
    <div class="b-col-1 item">1/12</div>
    <div class="b-col-2 item">2/12</div>
    <div class="b-col-3 item">3/12</div>
    <div class="b-col-4 item">4/12</div>
</div>

# 间隔

不指定 b-col-* 时，可以使用 gap-* 指定间隔。* 的取值范围为 4 的倍数，最大为 40

<div class="b-row gap-20">
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
</div>

指定 b-col-* 时

  • 如果使用负边距，得在外层再包裹一层，偏离了本栅格的初衷，因此不采用
  • 使用 CSS 根据子元素个数动态计算每一项的宽度，会导致代码中多了很多代码，如有需要自行计算，或使用 grid

# 嵌套

嵌套使用

<div class="b-row">
    <div class="b-col-9">
        <div class="b-row">
            <div class="b-col-6 item">9/12 * 1/2</div>
            <div class="b-col-6 item">9/12 * 1/2</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="b-col-3 item">3/12</div>
</div>

# 偏移

使用 offset-* 指定偏移

<div class="b-row">
    <div class="b-col-5 offset-7 item">5/12</div>
</div>

# 栅格系统（Grid）

设置为 12 格

# 默认

不指定 b-col-* 时将均分

<div class="b-grid">
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
</div>

# 间隔

可以使用 gap-* 指定间隔。* 的取值范围为 4 的倍数，最大为 40

<div class="b-grid gap-20">
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col-6 item">1</div>
    <div class="b-col-6 item">1</div>
</div>

# 嵌套

嵌套使用

<div class="b-grid">
    <div class="b-col-9">
        <div class="b-grid">
            <div class="b-col-6 item">9/12 * 1/2</div>
            <div class="b-col-6 item">9/12 * 1/2</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="b-col-3 item">3/12</div>
</div>

# 偏移

使用 offset-* 指定偏移

<div class="b-grid">
    <div class="b-col-5 offset-7 item">5/12</div>
</div>

# 按钮（Button）

# 常规

常规按钮

<button class="b-btn">Default</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-success">Success</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-warning">Warning</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-danger">Danger</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-info">Info</button>

# 镂空

镂空按钮

<button class="b-btn plain">Default</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-primary plain">Primary</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-success plain">Success</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-warning plain">Warning</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-danger plain">Danger</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-info plain">Info</button>

# 圆角

圆角按钮

<button class="b-btn round">Default</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-primary round">Primary</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-success round">Success</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-warning round">Warning</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-danger round">Danger</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-info round">Info</button>
<br><br>
<button class="b-btn plain round">Default</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-primary plain round">Primary</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-success plain round">Success</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-warning plain round">Warning</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-danger plain round">Danger</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-info plain round">Info</button>

# 文本

文本按钮

<button class="b-btn text">Default</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-primary text">Primary</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-success text">Success</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-warning text">Warning</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-danger text">Danger</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-info text">Info</button>

# 禁用

禁用按钮

<button class="b-btn disabled">Default</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-primary disabled">Primary</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-success disabled">Success</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-warning disabled">Warning</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-danger disabled">Danger</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-info disabled">Info</button>
<br><br>
<button class="b-btn plain disabled">Default</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-primary plain disabled">Primary</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-success plain disabled">Success</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-warning plain disabled">Warning</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-danger plain disabled">Danger</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-info plain disabled">Info</button>
<br><br>
<button class="b-btn text disabled">Default</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-primary text disabled">Primary</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-success text disabled">Success</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-warning text disabled">Warning</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-danger text disabled">Danger</button>
<button class="b-btn btn-info text disabled">Info</button>

# 按钮组

一组按钮

<div class="b-btn-group">
    <button class="b-btn">Default</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-success">Success</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-warning">Warning</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-danger">Danger</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-info">Info</button>
</div>
<br><br>
<div class="b-btn-group">
    <button class="b-btn plain">Default</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-primary plain">Primary</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-success plain">Success</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-warning plain">Warning</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-danger plain">Danger</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-info plain">Info</button>
</div>

# 垂直按钮组

垂直排列的一组按钮

<div class="b-btn-group vertical">
    <button class="b-btn">Default</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-success">Success</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-warning">Warning</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-danger">Danger</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-info">Info</button>
</div>
<div class="b-btn-group vertical">
    <button class="b-btn plain">Default</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-primary plain">Primary</button>
    <button class="b-btn btn-success plain">Success</button>

# 表单（Form）

# 常规

常规表单

<form class="b-form">
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">email</label>
        <div class="form-content">
            <input type="text" placeholder="placeholder" />
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">textarea</label>
        <div class="form-content">
            <textarea rows="3"></textarea>
        </div>
    </div>
</form>

# 标签位置

更改标签位置为左边

<form class="b-form">
    <div class="form-group b-row">
        <label class="form-label b-col-2">email</label>
        <div class="form-content b-col-10">
            <input type="text" />
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group b-row">
        <label class="form-label b-col-2">textarea</label>
        <div class="form-content b-col-10">
            <textarea rows="3"></textarea>
        </div>
    </div>
</form>

# 选框

单选框与多选框的样式

<form class="b-form">
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-checkbox" for="check-default">
            <input type="checkbox" id="check-default" hidden />
            default checkbox
        </label>

        <label class="form-checkbox" for="check-checked">
            <input type="checkbox" id="check-checked" checked hidden />
            checked checkbox
        </label>
        
        <label class="form-checkbox" for="radio-default">
            <input type="radio" name="radio" id="radio-default" hidden />
            default radio
        </label>
    
        <label class="form-checkbox" for="radio-checked">
            <input type="radio" name="radio" id="radio-checked" checked hidden />
            checked radio
        </label>
    </div>
</form>

# 下拉框

下拉框

<form class="b-form">
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">select</label>
        <div class="form-content">
            <div class="b-select">
                <select>
                    <option selected>请选择</option>
                    <option value="1">One</option>
                    <option value="2">Two</option>
                    <option value="3">Three</option>
                </select>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">multiple</label>
        <div class="form-content">
            <div class="b-select">
                <select multiple>
                    <option value="1">One</option>
                    <option value="2">Two</option>
                    <option value="3">Three</option>
                    <option value="4">Four</option>
                    <option value="5">Fire</option>
                </select>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</form>

# 行内表单

所有表单项位于一行

<form class="b-form form-inline">
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">email</label>
        <div class="form-content">
            <input type="text" />
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">username</label>
        <div class="form-content">
            <input type="text" />
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">select</label>
        <div class="form-content">
            <div class="b-select">
                <select>
                    <option selected>请选择</option>
                    <option value="1">One</option>
                    <option value="2">Two</option>
                    <option value="3">Three</option>
                </select>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</form>

# 禁用

禁用表单

<form class="b-form form-inline">
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">email</label>
        <div class="form-content disabled">
            <input type="text" value="123@123.com" />
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">select</label>
        <div class="form-content disabled">
            <div class="b-select">
                <select>
                    <option selected>请选择</option>
                    <option value="1">One</option>
                    <option value="2">Two</option>
                    <option value="3">Three</option>
                </select>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
        <label class="form-label">checkbox</label>
        <div class="form-content disabled">
            <label class="form-checkbox" for="check-dis">
                <input type="checkbox" id="check-dis" hidden />
                disabled checkbox
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
</form>
